hero.title: A studio built for teams who refuse to be forgettable.
hero.description: We are a tight, senior team that blends strategy, design, and build. Our focus is simple: help ambitious brands launch with clarity, confidence, and momentum.

items.first: Clarity beats noise. Every page should say one thing remarkably well.
items.second: Design earns attention, but performance earns trust.
items.third: Storytelling belongs in every interaction, not just the copy.

leadership.label: Leadership
leadership.title: Design, strategy, and engineering in one room.
leadership.description: You work directly with the people shaping the work, not a handoff chain.

method.label: Method
method.title: Short, focused sprints with weekly milestones.
method.description: Momentum stays high, feedback stays real, decisions stay sharp.

momentum.label: Momentum
momentum.title: Launches that feel inevitable, not improvised.
momentum.description: We set up your team for continuous improvement after go-live.

team.title: Small, senior, and intentionally built.
team.description: We keep the team lean so every engagement stays close, consistent, and accountable.

items.second: Conversion-led landing pages and marketing sites
items.third: Design systems with motion and interaction direction
items.fourth: Nuxt + Vue production builds and performance tuning
